Гольф - спортивная игра, суть которой за: Golf is a sports game, the essence of which is to score a ball into special holes. They should be passed by making a minimum number of strokes.
Традиционно принято считать гольф мужски: Traditionally, golf is considered a men's sport. Until recently, this was the case, and only men took part in the competitions. Recently, the fair sex also began to actively play golf and show good results, sometimes not inferior to men in this type of competition.
Травмирование в гольфе может произойти п: Injury in golf can occur for various reasons: an accidental blow with a club, a ball, a stone or a pebble bouncing off during a stroke. In order to avoid injury, players should observe certain safety measures
Перед совершением удара необходимо убеди: Before making a strike, it is necessary to make sure that all persons who are present during the competition are in a safe position.
Спортсменам запрещено наносить удар до т: Athletes are prohibited from striking until all those present have left the area of a possible ball drop.
Во время подготовки удара по мячу спортс: During the preparation of hitting the ball, the athlete must warn all the service personnel about this so that they leave the field.
Если спортсмен, совершивший удар, предви: If the athlete who made the kick foresees that the ball may hit anyone present, he must warn them by shouting “Handicap”.
Cоревнование “Любители гольфа“ прошло 3: The Golf Lovers competition was held on November 3 at the Strawberry Glades Golf Club
Благодарим за помощь в организации мероп: We thank our main partners for their help in organizing the event: United Metallurgical Company (OMK), Aeroflot-Russian Airlines, Pharmstandard. In 2022, the golf clubs "Pestovo", "Peterhof", "Forest Hills" remain among the main partners. The insurer is the Helios Insurance Company. The promoter of the tournament is the Golf Pro company.
На старт соревнования вышли 34 гольфиста: 34 golfers came to the start of the competition.
По итогам четырех соревновательных раунд: According to the results of four competitive rounds, Daniil Romashkin and Ekaterina Malakhova became the winners of the tournament. Alexey Karasev and Vera Markevich have silver, Stepan Surzhik and Ekaterina Petrova have bronze.
Большой теннис – вид спорта, в котором д: Lawn tennis is a sport in which two players or two teams of two people compete with each other. The goal of each of the players / teams is to throw the ball to the opponent's side with a racket in such a way that the opponent cannot reflect it. In this case, the ball must touch half of the opponent's field at least once.
Игроки или команды должны находиться по: Players or teams must be on opposite sides of the net. One of the players is a pitcher, the second, respectively, takes the pitch. The serving player must send the ball in such a way that it hits the court area on the opponent's half. The receiving player must have time to redirect (repel) the ball is on the opponent's side before it falls on the court or before it touches the court for the second time. If one of the tennis players missed the ball, then his opponent gets a point.
Теннисный матч состоит из «сетов», а они: A tennis match consists of "sets", and they, in turn, of "games", for which it is necessary to score goals to win (at least 4 balls: 15-30-40-game, but with a difference of at least two goals). When serving, the player has two attempts, in which he alternately feeds the ball into the left and right squares. After the game is drawn, the serve goes to the opponent. After drawing an odd number of games, players are given a minute break and the sides are changed. The player who wins 6 games first (provided that his opponent has won no more than 4 games) is considered to have won the set. To win a match, you need to win 2 out of 3 or 3 out of 5 sets. Whoever gets the required number of sets won wins the match.
Турнир “Любители тенниса“ прошёл 13 нояб: The Tennis Lovers tournament was held on November 13 at the Amur Courts tennis court
Благодарим за помощь в организации мероп: We thank the main partners for their help in organizing the event: the Amateur Tennis Commission of the Russian Tennis Federation (FTR), the RTS Tennis Club. With the participation of the Tennis club “Radvest". The insurer is the Helios Insurance Company. The promoter of the tournament is the Tennis-Pro company.
Основными целями турнира являются: объед: The main objectives of the tournament are: to unite the staff of the team into a single tournament structure, to support amateur tennis players and assist them in conducting amateur competitions, to popularize tennis, to strengthen friendly ties in the team.
Хоккей с шайбой — это спортивная командн: Ice hockey is a sports team game on ice, in which the goal is to throw the puck into the opponent's goal more times than the opposing team will do at a set time. The puck is passed from player to player on the ice court with special hockey sticks. The winner is the team that has thrown the most pucks into the opponent's goal.
Матч по хоккею с шайбой состоит из трех: An ice hockey match consists of three periods of 20 minutes of pure time. The breaks between periods last 15 minutes. In case of a draw at the end of three periods, it is possible to assign additional time (overtime). In case of a tie, free throws (shootouts) are made at the end of overtime. The need for overtime, as well as its duration, the need and the number of free throws are discussed separately in the tournament regulations.
Хоккейный матч обслуживает судейская бри: A hockey match is served by a referee team consisting of three or four referees. One or two referees (depending on the rules of the tournament) are called chief referees, the other two are assistant chief referees, or linesmen. The duties of the chief referee include tracking violations of the rules, fixing the taking of goals (goals). Assistant Chief Referees are responsible for tracking offside positions, puck runs, numerical violations, as well as puck throw-ins.
Чемпионат \"Хоккейных дел мастер\" прошё: The Hockey Master Championship was held on November 27 at the Yerofey Arena
Students of MBOU “Secondary School No. 76 named after A.A. Yesyagin" tried their hand at the hockey field. Elementary school students competed with each other for the title of champion of hockey affairs. 3 teams took part in the championship.
По итогам четырех матчей победителями ст: According to the results of four matches, the winners were the students of the 4th “A" class.
Чемпионат проводится с целью пропаганды: The championship is held in order to promote a healthy lifestyle, attract children to active sports, help children open up and believe in themselves, understand what they can and what they want, increase the team level and establish communication links within the team, popularize hockey among children.
Футбол - самый популярный командный вид: Football is the most popular team sport in the world, in which the goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal more times than the opposing team will do at the set time. The ball in the goal can be scored with your feet or any other body parts (except your hands).
Каждая футбольная команда должна состоят: Each football team must consist of a maximum of eleven players (that's how many can be on the field at the same time), one of whom is the goalkeeper and he is the only player who is allowed to play with his hands within the penalty area at his goal.
Футбольный матч состоит из двух таймов д: A football match consists of two halves lasting 45 minutes each. There is a 15-minute rest break between the halves, after which the teams change goals. This is done so that the teams are on an equal footing. The football game is won by the team that scored the most goals against the opponent. If the teams finished the match with the same score of goals, then a draw is fixed, or two additional halves of 15 minutes are assigned. If the extra time ended in a draw, a penalty shootout is awarded.
Любительский футбольный матч состоялся 1: The amateur football match took place on October 16 at the stadium named after Lenin
Основная цель любительских турниров — со: The main goal of amateur tournaments is to create a competitive environment and bring participants as close as possible to their football idols. Some events completely copy the format of the event and even the names of participating teams from professional competitions.
За золотую медаль боролись сборные коман: The national teams of Stroymashineri and Rostelecom competed for the gold medal.
\"СтройМашинери\" уверенно прошел группо: Stroymashineri confidently passed the group stage with five goals scored and only three conceded. In the final match, they beat Rostelecom, becoming champions of the Amateur football match.
\"Ростелеком\" занял второе место, но мо: Rostelecom took the second place, but can be satisfied with the fact that it demonstrated a good team game and won a strong-willed victory over an opponent who seemed stronger on paper.
Бокс – это контактный вид спорта (единоб: Boxing is a contact sport (martial arts) in which punches are allowed only with fists and only with special gloves.
Боксерский поединок разделен на раунды,: The boxing match is divided into rounds, each of which lasts from 3 to 5 minutes, depending on the level of the fight (amateur or professional). Boxers have 1 minute to rest between rounds.
The referee controls the course of the entire match. He can punish violations of the rules with a warning, the removal of points or even disqualification.
Боксерский поединок заканчивается в след: A boxing match ends in the following cases
один из спортсменов сбит с ног и не смож: one of the athletes is knocked down and will not be able to get up for 10 seconds;
после третьего нокдауна (правило действу: after the third knockdown (the rule applies in title fights under the auspices of the WBA);
один из спортсменов получил травму и не: one of the athletes was injured and cannot defend himself (technical knockout);
Если оба соперника отстояли все раунды и: If both opponents defended all rounds and there was no knockout, then the winner is determined by points. If the score is the same on points, then the winner is the athlete who won the most rounds on points. Sometimes there are draw results. In addition to the fact that boxers are prohibited from striking with any part of the body except the fist, they are also prohibited from: striking below the belt, holding an opponent, pushing, biting, spitting and fighting.
Турнир \"Любители бокса\" состоялся 29 о: The Boxing Lovers tournament took place on October 29 at the King&Ring
Прежде всего, непосредственная цель заня: First of all, the immediate goal of practicing any martial arts is the ability to stand up for yourself as effectively as possible, the acquisition of important and valuable self-defense skills. What qualities does boxing develop? Willpower, strengthening the spirit, overcoming one's own fears, weakness and self-doubt, developing endurance, increasing reaction speed.
Сразиться в спаринге решились 8 боксеров: 8 boxers-employees of the company “Otus” decided to fight in sparring. According to the results of the competition rounds, Ruslan Stepanov became the winner. All participants were awarded with memorable prizes and diplomas.
Благодарим за помощь в организации мероп: Thank you for your help in organizing the event of the main partners: Boxing Club Jab, Drummer Olympus-Ostrovtsy, Everlast store, Prosboxing. The insurer is the Helios Insurance Company. The promoter of the tournament is the Boxing-Pro company.
Настольный теннис (пинг-понг) – вид спор: Table tennis (ping pong) is a sport in which two players or two teams of two people (a pair game) compete with each other, trying to throw a special ball with rackets (through the net on the game table) to the opponent's side in such a way that the opponent could not reflect it. In this case, the ball must touch the opponent's half of the field at least once.
Каждая партия состоит из розыгрышей, каж: Each game consists of draws, each of which in turn begins with a submission. The pitcher in the first draw is determined by drawing lots. Then the feeders alternate every 2 pitches. The game continues until one of the players scores 11 points. When the score is 10:10, the serve goes to another player (team) after each draw until the gap is two points.
По старым правилам партия продолжалась д: According to the old rules, the game lasted up to 21 points, the pitchers alternated every five innings, with an equal score of 20:20, the pitch went to another player (team) after each draw until the gap was two points.
Ещё одно важное правило: в настольном те: Another important rule: you can't touch the table in table tennis!
Турнир \"Любители настольного тенниса\": The Table Tennis Lovers tournament was held on September 3 at the Academy Sports Club
Игры проходят по системе \"каждый с кажд: The games are played according to the "everyone with everyone" system (a circular table), the players are divided into leagues, depending on the skill level. This means that each player will play with an approximately equal player in strength.
Лига состоит из 8 человек, а это значит,: The league consists of 8 people, which means that each player will have 7 games. The duration of the tournament was 3 hours.
Во всех залах можно провести соревновани: In all halls it is possible to hold table tennis competitions satisfying any request: professional equipment and inventory, judging by both the staff of the club and the All-Russian board of judges, good light, sound, locker rooms, as well as photo and video support of the tournament.
Волейбол – это вид спорта, целью в котор: Volleyball is a sport in which the goal is to direct the ball towards the opponent in such a way that it lands on the opponent's half or to achieve an error on the part of the opposing team player. During one attack, only three consecutive touches of the ball are allowed. Volleyball is popular among both men and women.!
Волейбольный матч состоит из партий (от: A volleyball match consists of games (from 3 to 5). The duration of the volleyball game is unlimited and continues until one of the teams scores 25 points. If the advantage over the opponent is less than 2 points, the game continues until the advantage is increased. The match continues until one of the teams wins three games. It is worth noting that in the fifth game the score is not up to 25, but up to 15 points.
Каждая из двух команд может иметь в сост: Each of the two teams can have up to 14 players, but 6 can be on the field at the same time. The initial placement of the players indicates the order of the participants' transition on the court, it must be preserved throughout the game.
Турнир \"Волейбольный мяч\" прошёл 15 се: The Volleyball tournament was held on September 15 at the sports complex "Sportintur“
Организация проведения соревнований пров: The organization of the competitions was carried out with the support of the methodical cabinet of physical education teachers and the sports council of the SUNC MSU.
Состав главной судейской коллегии: Кобар: The composition of the main judging panel: Kobarenkova Tatiana Evgenievna - Chief Judge; Apostolidi Natalia Yurievna - Deputy Chief Judge, Bazileva Tatiana Ruslanovna - Chief Secretary of the competition.
Турнир проводился с целью привлечения уч: The tournament was held in order to attract students to regular physical education and sports, popularize volleyball as a sport, and determine the strongest volleyball team among the tournament participants.
Победители и призеры соревнований были н: The winners and prize-winners of the competitions were awarded with diplomas for 1st, 2nd and 3rd places and prizes. The participants of the competition who did not take prizes were awarded with "consolation" prizes.
Баскетбол – спортивная командная игра с: Basketball is a sports team game with a ball, the goal of which is to throw the ball into the opponent's basket more times than the opposing team will do at the set time. Each team consists of 5 field players.
В баскетбол играют две команды. Обычно к: Basketball is played by two teams. Usually the team consists of 12 people, 5 of whom are field players, and the rest are considered replacement players.
Спортсмены, владеющие мячом, должны пере: Athletes who own the ball must move around the field, hitting them on the floor. Otherwise, "passing the ball" will be counted, and this is a violation of the rules in basketball. Accidentally touching the ball with a part of the body other than the hand is not considered a violation, unlike purposeful play with a foot or fist.
Заброшенный в корзину мяч может приносит: A ball thrown into the basket can bring a different number of points to your team. If the ball is thrown during a free throw, the team earns 1 point. If the ball is thrown from an average or close distance (closer than the 3-point line), then the team is given 2 points. The team earns three points if the ball is thrown from behind the three-point line.
Если в основное время обе команды набрал: If both teams scored the same number of points in regular time, then a 5-minute overtime is assigned, if it ended in a draw, then the next one is assigned and so on until the winner is determined.
Баскетбольный матч состоялся 27 сентября: The basketball match took place on September 27 at the Bastion Sports Complex
В спортивной схватке решили сразиться со: Employees of the companies ”Velsporttrans” and ”Promsvyazbank” decided to fight in a sports fight. A basketball tournament was organized for them, which allows them to solve serious competitive issues on the playground.
Это уже не первый матч между командами,: This is not the first match between the teams, the more interesting it is to take part and watch the participants of the competition.
Наша команда всегда рада организовать ка: Our team is always happy to organize both an amateur tournament to increase employee loyalty to the company, and full-scale competitions.
